faq.title: Frequently Asked Questions
faq.subtitle: Everything you need to know about working with us

pricing.question: How do you price your services?
pricing.answer: We offer modular pricing based on Consult, Create, Build, and Amplify services. Each project receives a custom quote covering design, development, coordination, and marketing needs. Packages start from concept and visualization bundles to full end-to-end delivery with on-site supervision.

timeline.question: What is the typical project timeline?
timeline.answer: Timelines vary based on project scope, complexity, and launch requirements. We work backwards from your target date, coordinating design, development, vendor schedules, and testing phases to ensure on-time delivery. During discovery, we'll provide a detailed timeline tailored to your specific project.

process.question: What does your process involve?
process.answer: We start with discovery (stakeholder interviews, KPI definition), move to design and planning (spatial layouts, technical specs, visualizations), then production (interactive builds, AV systems, content), followed by supervision and support throughout launch.

support.question: Do you provide on-site supervision?
support.answer: Yes! We coordinate vendors, manage schedules and budgets, provide technical direction during installation, and offer on-site support. After launch, we provide content refresh plans, monitoring, and on-call support.

revisions.question: How many revisions are included?
revisions.answer: Typically 2-3 revision rounds per phase to ensure alignment and quality. We iterate at concept, detailed design, and development stages, ensuring what's built matches what was envisioned.

expertise.question: What services don't you provide?
expertise.answer: We don't do physical fabrication or civil works. That's handled by venue-appointed contractors. We provide production-ready designs, technical specs, and supervision to ensure seamless execution. Hardware procurement can be included on request.
